body.description: Summer’s Eve Ultimate Odor Protection Feminine Body Wash with a Unique Boric Acid complex for a PH Balanced wash is formulated with a patented odor-reducing ingredient. This feminine wash provides up to 24 hours of odor protection. This daily odor controlling, pH-balanced feminine wash is gynecologist-tested, clinically-tested, and gentle so it won’t irritate sensitive skin. This boric acid feminine wash is formulated to match the body’s natural chemistry, making it balanced to the healthy pH range of the vagina. Take your intimate care to the next level with this fresh scented feminine wash formulated to control odor for up to 24 hours. This feminine body wash is a refreshing, cleansing experience for your arms intimate area, so you can take on anything without worrying about vaginal Odor. Summer’s Eve Ultimate Odor Control body wash for women is made without dyes and parabens, not tested on animals, and gentle enough for daily use. Use this feminine body wash in the shower to gently cleanse away odor and discharge to leave you feeling fresh and confident all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A girls secret best friend
reviews.reviewText: Okay let’s be real for a moment ladies. Nobody can smell your down under. HOWEVER we have all experienced those moments of panic when you have caught a whiff of yourself and all you can think about is how everyone else is suddenly a blood hound and can smell you too. For peace of mind get yourself a bottle of this. The jug I got is huge and you only need a small squirt to properly cleanse that area. It’s going to last a long while and you’ll thank yourself for this quick new step to your daily hygiene. It works great on my sensitive skin. To be honest I thought this was going to cause big problems down there because of how sensitive my body is but in fact I haven’t had any bad reactions. I’m feeling more confident than ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Leaves you clean and happy
reviews.reviewText: I’m a fan of Summer’s Eve products and this feminine wash does not disappoint! My skin tends to be sensitive to new products and I didn’t experience any irritation with this wash. There is no scent, but this wash left me feeling clean and fresh after my shower. No issues so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always used Summers Eve, as it’s the only feminine wash I’ve tried that doesn’t irritate me. This one works just as well as the others. It lathers nicely and I feel clean after using it. I’m happy with this product and would order it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to dispense from bottle
reviews.reviewText: This body wash works well and leaves you feeling nice and clean. It's a good sized bottle, and it's easy to dispense from the bottle. It would be good for sensitive skin as well, and rinses off the skin easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hormone smell/funk is real and this ultimate odor control really helps! I feel clean and refreshed after using. There is a very faint scent, which isnt too bad! No irritation caused.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing and Gentle: A Must-Have for Her Daily Glow
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this product! It's become a staple in my wife's daily routine. The gentle scent and effective odor control make it a winner. Plus, the pH balance ensures her comfort throughout the day. It's like a little spa treatment in a bottle. Highly recommend for all the amazing ladies out there

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gentle feminine wash, lightly scented, definitely useful!I do wish the bottle had a pump to make it easier to dispense.Priced well at just under $5!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great feminine wash
reviews.reviewText: This Summer's Eve ultimate odor control feminine wash works great. It has a light scent to it that's tart and floral. It has a thick consistency and a light lather. It leaves me feeling really clean and it keeps me fresh all day long. The bottle doesn't have any type of safety seal on it but most feminine washes don't for some reason. Great working feminine wash for odor control.
